test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Loads Successfully
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads completely and displays core elements (header, navigation, featured products, footer) without errors.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a Product and View Details
steps: Enter 'Sofa' in the search bar and press Enter.
Click on a sofa product from the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The product details page loads correctly, displaying the product image, title, price, and available options.

test_scenarios.name: Add Product to Cart and Proceed to Checkout
steps: Search for 'Sofa' and select a product.
Click the 'View Cart' or 'Checkout' button (depending on UI).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The product is added to the cart, and the cart page (or checkout page) loads successfully, displaying the product in the cart and the total price.

test_scenarios.name: Create New Account
steps: Click on 'My Account' or similar link.
Enter valid email, password, first name, and last name in the required fields.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new account is created successfully, and the user is logged in and redirected to their account dashboard.
